page.title: 10Boys and Girls Sports Grove
page.content: In Grove there is a Footabll Club called Grove Challengers. It was founded in 1971 and now has 100 members aged 9 - 15, with 6 teams. The Under 15's won the League Match and Cup for 1984-85. There is a Player of the Year award for each team, every year. The team colours are black and white. The big event is the six a side match, when 30 teams from Bath to Oxford come. Six teams from N. Ireland also take part. For the last 6 years, this event has given those boys a four day break from their trouble torn country. A fairly new venture started is the BMX track in front of the Recreation Ground. Rugby and cricket are also played in W. Grove. A golf course is planned and an Athletics Stadium is also being considered.
